attributes.action: Stop gas, electric and water companies charging service charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop gas, electric and water companies charging fixed charges (service or fixed charges) ether these charges should be stopped or just added to the unit cost of there bills as these charges are a tax on there customers. 
A person with a pay as you go meter is penalised in this way of paying, if say they do not have the money to put credit on there meter for say one week the then have to find the extra money to put credit on the meter for not just that week, but they have to in clued the service charge for the previous week, so as you can see it is a penalty for the poor. So pleases support this partition.
